title: P2P Advertiser Create (request)
description: Registers the client as a P2P advertiser.

contact_info.description: [Optional] Advertiser's contact information, to be used as a default for new sell adverts.

default_advert_description.description: [Optional] Default description that can be used every time an advert is created.

payment_info.description: [Optional] Advertiser's payment information, to be used as a default for new sell adverts.

subscribe.description: [Optional] If set to 1, will send updates whenever there is an update to advertiser

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
